definitions.definition: A small case , often flat and often made of leather , for keeping money (especially paper money ), credit cards , etc.
examples: The thief stole all the money and credit cards out of the old man's wallet .
I forgot my wallet and left it at home.

definitions.definition: A person's bank account or assets.
examples: It's unknown if the pro running back's recent sex scandal will hit him in the wallet or not.

definitions.definition: A thick case or folder with plastic sleeves in which compact discs may be stored.
examples: I won an auction online for a cheap CD wallet .
He brought with him a large wallet with some provisions for the road.

definitions.definition: A person's buttocks (the area of the body nearest where one keeps one's wallet).
examples: He fell down and landed on his wallet .

main_definition: ( US , UK ) A small case , often flat and often made of leather , for keeping money (especially paper money ), credit cards , etc.
secondary_definitions: ( by extension , informal ) A person's bank account or assets.
( computing , finance ) An e-wallet or digital wallet .
A thick case or folder with plastic sleeves in which compact discs may be stored.
( slang ) A person's buttocks (the area of the body nearest where one keeps one's wallet).
